backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing feature evidence, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing game state, keyboard input, and rendering the HUD and canvas.
frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx: HUD component displaying title, Internet Identity login controls, status messages, and start/restart actions.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Utility for loading game image assets with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/game/JungleFuryCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer drawing the background, track, cars, obstacles, and finish line each frame.
frontend/src/game/useJungleFuryGame.ts: React hook implementing simulation logic including movement, spawning, collisions, and game snapshots.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that constructs an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and manages query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom jungle-themed OKLCH color variables with utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color mappings, typography, animations, and plugins for the project's jungle theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Jungle Fury game build.
